title: Eggless Marriage: Woman Leaves Husband As He Didn't Give Her Eggs To Eat, Runs Away With Lover
text:
Eggless Marriage: Woman Leaves Husband As He Didn't Give Her Eggs To Eat, Runs Away With Lover

Eggless Marriage: Woman Leaves Husband As He Didn't Give Her Eggs To Eat, Runs Away With Lover

Of all the things that people cannot tolerate having restrictions put on, food ranks somewhere high up. No one likes being told what to eat and what not to. In what appears to be a bizarre incident, a woman in Uttar Pradesh’s Gorakhpur district left her husband due to ‘egglessness’; she was allegedly denied eggs by her husband.

The woman reportedly lives in Campierganj and had eloped with her lover four months ago, according to the police. After she returned, she told them that she was upset as her husband did not get her eggs to eat, which she clearly likes a lot.

Twitter

The married couple reportedly fought again two days ago for eggs and the woman ran away again. Her paramour was also not found at his house, therefore it is being believed that they eloped together.

The husband is a daily wage labourer and reportedly said that he cannot afford to buy eggs every day of the week. He also allegedly said that the wife’s paramour knew about her weakness for eggs and the husband’s inability to fulfill that need, so he brought them for her daily.
